response.overview: Following the huge success of the previous work, Sota is back in “Man Power”! The trained body of a former firefighter comes back even more lewd! ! Sota went through a transition period from his 20s to his 30s during the filming period, and his adult pheromones were leaking even more! He is a cock of a man who reacts so quickly to men that he no longer knows where his sexual orientation is. A lewd body that cannot resist the pleasure and accepts the desires of men. He can't go back to being a pure straight guy anymore... The fire that reaches Sota's body quickly turns into a lewd flame and spreads!!
response.tagline: I can't go back to being a pure straight guy.
response.title: Man Power Soujou
